titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the program of grants for preventive health services with respect to tuberculosis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 6/23/1987--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to States and other public and nonprofit private entities, with regard to prevention and control of tuberculosis, for: (1) research; (2) demonstration projects; (3) public information and education; and (4) education, training, and clinical skills improvement activities for health professionals. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1988 through 1990 for grants under existing provisions relating to preventive health service programs and for grants authorized by this Act relating to tuberculosis.
